Barcelona are willing to let Ousmane Dembele leave on loan this summer, according to reports.

The France international has been linked with Arsenal, while Liverpool are also said to be keen on the attacker.

And Sky Sports claim Barcelona are open to the idea of allowing Dembele to spend the season away from the Camp Nou, with Antoine Griezmann set to arrive.

Arsenal's Santi Cazorla to train with Villarreal when deal ends - source

Santi Cazorla is set to return to his former club Villarreal for preseason training when his Arsenal contract ends next month, a source close to the La Liga club has told ESPN FC.

Cazorla, sidelined for the past 18 months with a severe Achilles injury, is hoping to play again next year but has not been offered a new contract by the Gunners.

"Cazorla is expected to join Villarreal in preseason but it is not yet official," the source told ESPN FC.

It's a sad day for the club as Santi Cazorla waves goodbye after a six years with us - and Nacho Monreal will feel his exit more than most.

"It has been really difficult because Santi is one of the best players for Arsenal," Monreal told Arsenal Player.

"We miss him on the pitch and outside the pitch. You can’t imagine how important he is, every day members of staff, team-mates ask me about him so we have missed him a lot.

"I speak with him every week, we are in contact, I ask him how he feels, so we are in touch.

"Everyone loves Santi because he is a special player and special person, when you are with him you feel happy because he is laughing all the time, he is very positive in any moment and that makes you feel better when you are next to him.

"This is why he is so popular and why so many people love him."

quote.msg:
It's a sad day for the club as Santi Cazorla waves goodbye after a six years with us - and Nacho Monreal will feel his exit more than most.

"It has been really difficult because Santi is one of the best players for Arsenal," Monreal told Arsenal Player.

"We miss him on the pitch and outside the pitch. You can’t imagine how important he is, every day members of staff, team-mates ask me about him so we have missed him a lot.

"I speak with him every week, we are in contact, I ask him how he feels, so we are in touch.

"Everyone loves Santi because he is a special player and special person, when you are with him you feel happy because he is laughing all the time, he is very positive in any moment and that makes you feel better when you are next to him.

"This is why he is so popular and why so many people love him."

https://www.arsenal.com/news/santi-special-player-and-special-person
